title: Access Files from Zenodo Deposits
text: Access, download locally cache files deposited Zenodo easily.

title: Access Files from Zenodo Deposits
text: can install development version zendown GitHub :

title: Access Files from Zenodo Deposits
text: Zenodo deposit contains RDS files examples datasets. First, need find Zenodo deposit code. number appears end Zenodo deposit link. code number also appears Zenodo DOI. Deposition code: 10959197 deposit code desired file name, can just access file zen_file function. function create cache machine accessed files, avoiding re-downloading access file .
code: library(zendown) https://zenodo.org/records/10959197 my_iris <- zen_file(deposit_id = 10959197, file_name = "iris.rds") |>   readRDS()  head(my_iris) #>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width Species #> 1          5.1         3.5          1.4         0.2  setosa #> 2          4.9         3.0          1.4         0.2  setosa #> 3          4.7         3.2          1.3         0.2  setosa #> 4          4.6         3.1          1.5         0.2  setosa #> 5          5.0         3.6          1.4         0.2  setosa #> 6          5.4         3.9          1.7         0.4  setosa

title: Access Files from Zenodo Deposits
code: # https://zenodo.org/records/10848 zen_file(10848, "DOAJ_Soc_Licenses_Correct.csv") |>   read.csv2() |>   tibble::tibble() |>   head() #> # A tibble: 6 × 12 #>       X DOAJNR Title Title.Alternative Identifier Publisher Language ISSN  EISSN #>   <int>  <int> <chr> <chr>             <chr>      <chr>     <chr>    <chr> <chr> #> 1     1     37 "Est…  <NA>             http://ww… "Univers… Spanish… 1405… <NA>  #> 2     2     65 "Rev… "Review of Resea… http://rc… "Expert … English… 1583… 1584… #> 3     3     85 "Soc…  <NA>             http://ej… "Firenze… English… 2038… <NA>  #> 4     4    106 "Jou…  <NA>             http://jf… "New Pra… English  1945… 1944… #> 5     5    195 "OÃ±…  <NA>             http://op… "OÃ±ati … English… 2079… <NA>  #> 6     6    198 "Soc…  <NA>             http://so… "Associa… French   1950… <NA>  #> # ℹ 3 more variables: CC.License.Doaj <chr>, CC.License.Checked <chr>, #> #   Wrong.Cat.Doaj <chr> # https://zenodo.org/records/10947952 zen_file(10947952, "2m_temperature_max.parquet") |>   arrow::read_parquet() |>   tibble::tibble() |>   head() #> # A tibble: 6 × 4 #>   code_muni date       name                    value #>       <int> <date>     <chr>                   <dbl> #> 1   1100015 2023-01-01 2m_temperature_max_mean  304. #> 2   1100015 2023-01-02 2m_temperature_max_mean  302. #> 3   1100015 2023-01-03 2m_temperature_max_mean  302. #> 4   1100015 2023-01-04 2m_temperature_max_mean  302. #> 5   1100015 2023-01-05 2m_temperature_max_mean  297. #> 6   1100015 2023-01-06 2m_temperature_max_mean  302. # https://zenodo.org/records/10889682 zen_file(10889682, "total_precipitation_2023-09-01_2023-09-30_day_sum.nc") |>   terra::rast() |>   terra::plot(1)

title: Access Files from Zenodo Deposits
text: explore Zenodo API possibilities problematically store files procedures, check zen4R package.

title: Delete all deposit mirrors — delete_all_mirrors
text: delete deposit mirrors stored locally.

title: Delete all deposit mirrors — delete_all_mirrors
Delete all deposit mirrors — delete_all_mirrors
text: return value. function deletes deposits mirrored system.

title: Delete all deposit mirrors — delete_all_mirrors
code: # https://zenodo.org/records/10959197 file_path <- zen_file(10959197, "iris.rds") print(file_path) #> ~/.cache/zendown/10959197/iris.rds file.exists(file_path) #> [1] TRUE delete_all_mirrors() file.exists(file_path) #> [1] FALSE

title: Delete a deposit mirror — delete_mirror
text: function delete mirrored files stored locally.

title: Delete a deposit mirror — delete_mirror
Delete a deposit mirror — delete_mirror
text: deposit_id numeric. Zenodo deposit id.

title: Delete a deposit mirror — delete_mirror
text: return value. function deletes mirrored system.

title: Delete a deposit mirror — delete_mirror
code: # https://zenodo.org/records/10959197 file_path <- zen_file(10959197, "iris.rds") print(file_path) #> ~/.cache/zendown/10959197/iris.rds file.exists(file_path) #> [1] TRUE delete_mirror(10959197) file.exists(file_path) #> [1] FALSE

what: Download files from a Zenodo deposit — download_deposit
title: Download files from a Zenodo deposit — download_deposit
text: Download files Zenodo deposit

title: Download files from a Zenodo deposit — download_deposit
code: download_deposit(list_deposit, file_name = NULL, dest, quiet = FALSE)

title: Download files from a Zenodo deposit — download_deposit
text: list_deposit data.frame tibble. Obtained list_deposit. file_name character. NULL, files file list. file name specified, file downloaded. dest character. Destination folder. quiet logical. Show download info progress bar.

title: Download files from a Zenodo deposit — download_deposit
text: return value. function downloads files specified destination.

title: Download files from a Zenodo deposit — download_deposit
code: res <- list_deposit(deposit_id = 10959197) temp_dir <- tempdir() download_deposit(list_deposit = res, dest = temp_dir, quiet = FALSE) file.exists(file.path(temp_dir, "iris.rds")) #> [1] TRUE file.exists(file.path(temp_dir, "mtcars.rds")) #> [1] TRUE

what: Get a list of files available at a Zenodo deposit — list_deposit
title: Get a list of files available at a Zenodo deposit — list_deposit
text: Get list files available Zenodo deposit

title: Get a list of files available at a Zenodo deposit — list_deposit
Get a list of files available at a Zenodo deposit — list_deposit
text: deposit_id numeric. Zenodo deposit id.

title: Get a list of files available at a Zenodo deposit — list_deposit
text: tibble.

title: Get a list of files available at a Zenodo deposit — list_deposit
code: # https://zenodo.org/records/10959197 list_deposit(deposit_id = 10959197) #> # A tibble: 5 × 6 #>   id                                   filename filesize checksum self  download #>   <chr>                                <chr>       <dbl> <chr>    <chr> <chr>    #> 1 e09ba3f1-f9b5-44ad-a403-d084f046c96d mtcars.…     1225 994977c… http… https:/… #> 2 1eee5ca9-272c-48e3-9962-ae4c72c1f1d9 ToothGr…      371 365f3f8… http… https:/… #> 3 2873000e-40bc-44f5-ae0f-f6fcdcaff3a5 PlantGr…      325 d185729… http… https:/… #> 4 b751722e-a6a8-47c5-b9b0-6d37afdab932 iris3.r…     1025 7006023… http… https:/… #> 5 21ce7a06-effe-4c40-b8b7-4ed8da3075f2 iris.rds     1091 85dda31… http… https:/…

what: Mirror a Zenodo deposit locally — mirror_deposit
title: Mirror a Zenodo deposit locally — mirror_deposit
text: Mirror entire Zenodo deposit specific file locally. mirror folder deposit files created cache folder operating system.

title: Mirror a Zenodo deposit locally — mirror_deposit
code: mirror_deposit(   deposit_id,   file_name = NULL,   clear_cache = FALSE,   quiet = FALSE )

title: Mirror a Zenodo deposit locally — mirror_deposit
text: deposit_id numeric. Zenodo deposit id. file_name character. NULL, files file list. file name specified, file downloaded. clear_cache logical. mirror already exists, clear content. quiet logical. Show download info progress bar.

title: Mirror a Zenodo deposit locally — mirror_deposit
text: string mirror path.

title: Mirror a Zenodo deposit locally — mirror_deposit
code: # https://zenodo.org/records/10959197 mirror_path <- mirror_deposit(deposit_id = 10959197) file.exists(file.path(mirror_path, "iris.rds")) #> [1] TRUE file.exists(file.path(mirror_path, "mtcars.rds")) #> [1] TRUE

what: Access a Zenodo deposit file — zen_file
title: Access a Zenodo deposit file — zen_file
text: Get local path Zenodo deposit file. cached mirror yet, download file deposit mirror cache locally.

title: Access a Zenodo deposit file — zen_file
code: zen_file(deposit_id, file_name, clear_cache = FALSE, quiet = FALSE)

title: Access a Zenodo deposit file — zen_file
text: deposit_id numeric. Zenodo deposit id. file_name character. NULL, files file list. file name specified, file downloaded. clear_cache logical. mirror already exists, clear content. quiet logical. Show download info progress bar.

title: Access a Zenodo deposit file — zen_file
text: string mirror file path.

title: Access a Zenodo deposit file — zen_file
